metric1.name: Infrastructure Health
metric1.query: FROM WorkloadStatus SELECT latest(statusValue) WHERE entity.name = 'PartnerReadyPortal(PRP)-PROD_Infra'

metric2.name: Response Time (s)
metric2.query: FROM Transaction SELECT average(duration) WHERE appName = '210135-Partner Ready Portal (PRP)-Production'

metric3.name: Synthetic Availability (%)
metric3.query: FROM SyntheticCheck SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE result='SUCCESS') WHERE monitorName IN ('210135-Partner Ready Portal(PRP)-Production(HW Led Quoting User Journey)-Login', '210135-Partner Ready Portal(PRP)-Production(HW Led Quoting User Journey)-OpenOpty')

metric4.name: End User Performance
metric4.query: FROM BrowserInteraction SELECT apdex(duration) WHERE appName = '210135-Partner Ready Portal (PRP)-Production'

metric5.name: Login
metric5.query: FROM Transaction SELECT average(duration) WHERE appName = '210135-Partner Ready Portal (PRP)-Production' AND request.uri = '/web/prp/login'

metric6.name: Parther Authentication
metric6.query: FROM Transaction SELECT average(duration) WHERE appName = '210135-Partner Ready Portal (PRP)-Production' AND request.uri = '/group/prp'

metric7.name: Home Page
metric7.query: FROM Transaction SELECT average(duration) WHERE appName = '210135-Partner Ready Portal (PRP)-Production' AND request.uri = '/group/prp/home'

metric8.name: Alerts
metric8.criticalAlert: FROM NrAiIncident SELECT count(*) WHERE entity.name = '210135-Partner Ready Portal (PRP)-Production' AND event = 'open' AND priority = 'critical'
metric8.warningAlert: FROM NrAiIncident SELECT count(*) WHERE entity.name = '210135-Partner Ready Portal (PRP)-Production' AND event = 'open' AND priority = 'warning'
